title: ImTOO iTransfer Platinum v5.5.6.20131113-LAXiTY

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a complete application that allows you to transfer and backup videos, music, photos and books from iPhone to computer / iTunes or from computer to iPhone and let you to copy any CD music / DVD movie / audio / video to iPhone, create iPhone ringtones etc.

Description: ImTOO iTransfer Platinum provides the all-around iPad/iPhone/iPod solutions which can backup almost all kinds of files, including music, movies, photos, eBooks, contacts, messages and apps in iPad/iPhone/iPod to computer or iTunes, convert DVD, ISO images, IFO folders, CD, audios, and videos to iPad/iPhone/iPod movies and music, one-step to download and convert online videos to iPad/iPhone/iPod compatible video/audio files, produce iPhone ringtones from audios or videos etc.


Features:-

    Fully support output files for iPad, iPad 2, New iPad, iPad 4, iPad mini, iPod nano, iPod nano 5G, iPod nano 7, iPod classic, iPod touch, iPod touch 5, iPod shuffle, original iPhone, iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, CDMA iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, etc. support iOS 4.2, iOS 4.3, iOS 6.1 and iTunes 10.7.
    DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t bother for searching your data connection cable in case it is misplaced ImTOO iTransfer Platinum supports data transfer via Wi-Fi.
    Simultaneously manage multiple devices easily, connect multiple devices simultaneously, just by drag-and-drop to share your favorites with friends and family (e.g. iPod to iPad, iPhone to iPad).
    Drag and drop application between your PC and device, and even manage document for the application which supports this operation.
    Copy music, movies and playlist to device, computer or iTunes.
    Delete songs from one playlist and then move them to another one to create your very own playlist.
    Multiple view types to show music, movies and photos, they are songs, albums, artists and genres.
    It is easy to create new photo albums and playlist or delete existing ones on iPad/iPhone/iPod for you with ImTOO iTransfer Platinum.
    The profiles are optimized when you are importing or converting multimedia files into devices.
